org.GameLogic.Board

Class Bag

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.GameLogic.Board.Bag

  • public class Bag
extends java.lang.Object
    This class does manage the bag. From here, all tiles will be created. If the game can request tiles from the bag, which will be given out.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Bag(int tileTypesCount, int tileFrequency, int tilesPerHand)
      Constructs a bag with the size of tileTypesCount * tileTypesCount * tileFrequency.

    • Method Summary

      java.util.ArrayList<Tile> takeStartTiles()
      Give out the starting Tiles.
      java.util.ArrayList<Tile> takeTiles(int count)

        Checks if a player can swap his desired amount of tiles.

        Returns:
